about.pageDescription: Watt Route isn't just an app; it's a movement. We are building the digital infrastructure to eliminate range anxiety and accelerate the transition to sustainable mobility.
about.missionText: We are revolutionizing EV adoption in Egypt by removing the biggest barrier to ownership: range anxiety. Our platform connects drivers to a growing network of charging stations while providing real-time data, smart routing, and seamless payments.
about.sustainabilityText: We're committed to building a greener Egypt through electric mobility.
about.innovationText: We continuously improve our platform to stay ahead of industry trends.
about.communityText: We empower EV drivers by fostering a supportive community.
about.joinMovementText: Help us expand charging access and make sustainable mobility the default in Egypt.

pages.findChargingStationsDescription: Our charging station finder is currently under development. We're working hard to bring you the best experience for locating EV charging stations across Egypt.

aboutPage.pageDescription: Watt Route isn't just an app; it's a movement. We are building the digital infrastructure to eliminate range anxiety and accelerate the transition to sustainable mobility.
aboutPage.missionSubtitle: The all-in-one platform for EV owners in Egypt. Seamless charging, smart routing, and a greener future.
aboutPage.drivingLeadsDesc: We don't just show map pins; we actively route drivers to stations, increasing utilization and revenue for Charge Point Operators (CPOs).
aboutPage.dataDesc: Using aggregated user activity, charging behaviors, and route heatmaps, we help CPOs identify service gaps and plan the next generation of charging infrastructure efficiently.
aboutPage.egyptVisionText: We are a catalyst for the "Environment" pillar of Egypt's Vision 2030, directly contributing to the reduction of carbon emissions and the adoption of clean energy transportation across the nation.
aboutPage.unSdg7Text: By removing barriers to entry for EVs, we increase the demand for clean energy solutions and ensure modern energy services are accessible to all Egyptians.
aboutPage.unSdg13Text: Every EV mile driven instead of a combustion engine mile reduces CO2. Watt Route accelerates this shift, taking urgent action to combat climate change and its impacts.
aboutPage.joinMovementDesc: Help us expand charging access and make sustainable mobility the default in Egypt.

evSolutionsPage.pageDescription: From smart charging sessions to 24/7 support, we provide everything you need for a seamless electric vehicle charging experience.
evSolutionsPage.industryLeadingText: Egypt's most reliable and extensive EV charging network
evSolutionsPage.ultraFastChargingText: Up to 120kW DC fast charging for minimal wait times
evSolutionsPage.nationwideCoverageText: 500+ charging stations across major cities and highways
evSolutionsPage.smartTechnologyText: AI-powered routing and real-time availability updates
evSolutionsPage.readyToGetStartedDesc: Join thousands of EV drivers who trust Watt Route for their charging needs
